description:
A compact iron with precise temperature control for easy, thorough waxing. The non-stick dimpled heating plate easily glides along the base when melting and distributing wax.

  • 800 Watts of power and a thick plate ensure quick and constant heat
  • Digital controls and a highly accurate thermostat provide exact temperature control
  • Extra thick 1.5cm thick base plate provides exceptional heat retention
name: Tools4Boards Digital Iron
